name: Swap Investment
summary: Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field.
description:
Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field. You Invest a magic item and remove a previously invested item. The previous item no longer counts against your limit of 10 invested items.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
